title: [IIP-13] Code Improvements and Flash Loan Fee Adjustment
body:
### Summary
This off-chain poll aims to gauge the sentiment among stkIDLE holders regarding [IIP-13](https://gov.idle.finance/t/iip-13-code-improvements-and-flash-loan-fee-adjustment/680), which has been [launched on-chain](https://idle.finance/#/governance/proposals/13).
If the poll will reach the quorum, the vote will be broadcasted on-chain.

This IIP would decrease the Flash Loan fee to 0.02% and execute a series of minor bug fixes, upgrading the oracle to v3.

### IIP Motivation
The proposal passed the [Temperature Check](https://gov.idle.finance/t/iip-13-code-improvements-and-flash-loan-fee-adjustment/680/3) and has been launched on-chain.

An Immunefy contributor discovered a bug related to a deprecated method and Dev League released PriceOracleV3.
The proposal includes also a couple of small fixes in the IdleTokenGovernance rebalance method.

The idleController oracle update would embed the Flash Loan fee change.
The current fee is 0.08%, and this IIP proposes to reduce it to 0.02%. This change would allow Idle protocol to become more competitive on Ethereum and the upcoming Polygon layers.

Check the details of the motivations [here](https://gov.idle.finance/t/iip-13-code-improvements-and-flash-loan-fee-adjustment/680).

### Details
The technical implementation is available [here](https://etherscan.io/address/0xea091ed7146e2c3cf3ac11fa296e206e55177b30) and was developed by Dev League.

Actions:
* Implementation and oracle address update on Best-Yield idleTokens (8 actions)
* idleController oracle address update and Flash Loan fee change (1 action)

This IIP complies with the [stkIDLE Voting Framework](https://gov.idle.finance/t/voting-framework-for-stkidle-holders/567).
Only stkIDLE holders can vote on this poll.
**Threshold to make the poll valid** (both metrics should be reached):
- 30% of circulating stkIDLE voting the poll (min. 71’439 stkIDLE)
- at least 70% on the same option

If the poll reaches the quorum, the community multisig will broadcast the decision on-chain.
Current On-chain Voting Power: 344’184 $IDLE


### Voting Options
Please cast your vote on one of the following options:
**FOR**: Approve IIP-13 execution
**AGAINST**: Vote against IIP-13 execution
